rows.label: bf06130100_0010
rows.name:
We can reach Luxuria by ship, but once
there we'll need to do a spot of walking.

rows.label: bf06130100_0020
rows.name:
So we're traveling with Turtle-chan here?
Never thought I'd see the day...

rows.label: bf06130100_0030
rows.name: I think you'll find I make a fantastic ally.

rows.label: bf06130100_0040
rows.name:
Luck of Zeke not so great.
Bet we shipwrecked by tomorrow.

rows.label: bf06130100_0080
rows.name:
You said before that Iira concerned
you too... What did you mean by that?

rows.label: bf06130100_0100
rows.name:
I don't know about those clowns, but Iira
the country that fell 500 years ago...

rows.label: bf06130100_0110
rows.name: They were the ancestors of us Luxurian.

rows.label: bf06130100_0120
rows.name:
The people of Luxuria are descended from Adel,
the hero of Iira who escaped its destruction.

rows.label: bf06130100_0130
rows.name:
So... After Homura fell asleep,
Adel escaped to Luxuria?

rows.label: bf06130100_0160
rows.name: That is the first I've heard of it.

rows.label: bf06130100_0165
rows.name:
I have studied much history,
but this story never featured. Most peculiar.

rows.label: bf06130100_0170
rows.name: Can't really brag about this kinda stuff in public.

rows.label: bf06130100_0180
rows.name:
The only real trace left is in this
here sigil of the royal family...
